types.section:
{{head|fr|noun|head=[[fini]]-[[parti]]}}

# a [[work]] [[arrangement]] by which the [[employee]] can [[leave]] as soon as their [[work]] is done, regardless of the number of [[daily]] [[hour]]s in the [[contract]]
types.html:
fini-parti

  1. a work arrangement by which the employee can leave as soon as their work is done, regardless of the number of daily hours in the contract
trans: a work arrangement by which the employee can leave as soon as their work is done, regardless of the number of daily hours in the contract
